title: 客户端报错崩溃在线等很急
author: overmiku
txt_content:
---- Minecraft Crash Report ----
// Don't be sad. I'll do better next time, I promise!

Time: 16-11-25 下午6:15
Description: Initializing game

replies.txt_content:
删除神秘工匠？
